column4: My computer is behaving very oddly indeed. I do a new hard drive install of Xubuntu and it ends up having all the GNOME stuff of before...
And yet the ubuntu-desktop package is unmarked
ubuntu-desktop is dummy after everything is installed :P ive uninstalled it plenty of times and reinstalled it with nothing changing :pPP
I know it's a metapackage, but I thought it might be an indicator that it was old stuff from my hdd
